title:
Torsion of elliptic curves with rational $j$-invariant over the maximal
  elementary abelian 2-extension of $\mathbb{Q}$
abstract:
In this paper, we classify the possible torsion subgroup structures of
elliptic curves defined over the compositum of all quadratic extensions of the
rational number field, whose $j$-invariant is a rational number not equal to 0
or 1728.
